mapper.select: SELECT lrc.*, g.`name` AS grade_name, s.`name` AS subject_name, t.`name` AS lecturer_name, FROM lms_record_course AS lrc LEFT JOIN lms_grade AS g ON lc.grade_id = g.id LEFT JOIN lms_subject AS s ON lc.subject_id = s.id LEFT JOIN ums_teacher AS t ON lc.lecturer_id = t.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
